name: Beginning Glassblowing and Glass Art
description: This course introduces students to the basic techniques of glassblowing and glass art.

name: Intermediate Glassblowing and Glass Art
description: This course builds upon the techniques learned in Beginning Glassblowing and Glass Art and introduces students to more advanced techniques.

name: Advanced Glassblowing and Glass Art
description: This course builds upon the techniques learned in Intermediate Glassblowing and Glass Art and introduces students to more complex glassblowing and glass art techniques.
